title: Brotherly Love
itunes:title: Brotherly Love
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been having an affair with a married man and I am deeply in love with him. His brother has been allowing us to visit his apartment, or should I say our “Love Nest” to see each other. My man gives his brother $100 and the brother takes off for about an hour or so, leaving us alone in the apartment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been having an affair with a married man and I am deeply in love with him. My man gives his brother $100 and the brother takes off for about an hour or so, leaving us alone in the apartment.
